Shropshire Red: Shropshire Red is made by Belton Farm as part of their range of coloured cheeses -which includes Double Gloucester, Red Leicester and Red Fox.
Shropshire Red is a fabulous handmade cheese
with an intense and complex flavour profile being a mix of sweet and savoury flavours with a hint of caramel.
Currently only available in Sainsbury in Taste the Difference pre-packs and on the deli counter.
